title: HorizontalBarChartView bar negative values position
body: ## What did you do? I'm using HorizontalBarChartView to display few positive and negative values. ## What did you expect to happen? I would like to display value labels outside of the bars : behind the bar for positive values and ahead of the bar for negative values. ## What happened instead? Display is correct for positive values but for negative the value label appear inside the bar, on the left of the zero axis. ## Charts Environment **Charts version/Branch/Commit Number: Charts 3.2.2** **Xcode version: Xcode 10.1** **Swift version: Swift 4.2** **Platform(s) running Charts: iOS 12.1** **macOS version running Xcode: macOS 10.14.3** ## Demo Project ``` private func setupChart() { chartView.pinchZoomEnabled = false chartView.dragEnabled = false chartView.setScaleEnabled(false) chartView.drawValueAboveBarEnabled = true chartView.data?.highlightEnabled = false chartView.rightAxis.enabled = false chartView.legend.enabled = false let xAxis = chartView.xAxis xAxis.labelPosition = .bottom xAxis.drawAxisLineEnabled = false xAxis.drawGridLinesEnabled = true xAxis.granularity = 1 xAxis.labelCount = 10 xAxis.valueFormatter = self xAxis.spaceMax = 0.8 xAxis.spaceMin = 0.8 let leftAxis = chartView.leftAxis leftAxis.drawGridLinesEnabled = false leftAxis.drawAxisLineEnabled = true leftAxis.drawZeroLineEnabled = true leftAxis.drawLabelsEnabled = true leftAxis.axisLineWidth = 2 leftAxis.zeroLineWidth = leftAxis.axisLineWidth leftAxis.zeroLineColor = leftAxis.axisLineColor leftAxis.valueFormatter = self let rightAxis = chartView.rightAxis rightAxis.enabled = false } ``` ``` private func loadChartData() { let range:UInt32 = 500 let barWidth = 0.7 let yVals = (0..<10).map { (i) -> BarChartDataEntry in let mult = range + 1 let val = Double(arc4random_uniform(mult)) - 250000 let entry = BarChartDataEntry(x: Double(i), y: val, icon: nil) return entry } let set1 = BarChartDataSet(values: yVals, label: nil) set1.drawValuesEnabled = true let data = BarChartData(dataSet: set1) data.setValueFormatter(self) data.barWidth = barWidth data.highlightEnabled = false chartView.data = data } ``` ``` // IValueFormatter func stringForValue(_ value: Double, entry: ChartDataEntry, dataSetIndex: Int, viewPortHandler: ViewPortHandler?) -> String { return "\(value)" } ``` ``` // IAxisValueFormatter func stringForValue(_ value: Double, axis: AxisBase?) -> String { if axis == self.chartView.xAxis { return "LABEL \(value)" } return "\(value)" } ```
